thm pserval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s1, cc, cmpt(s2, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cc, c1, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)), co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cexp, cv(s0))
  eqtri(c1, cmpt(hs0, cc, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))))), cmpt(s1, cc, cmpt(s2, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))))))
  cbvmptv(s1, hs0, cc, cmpt(s2, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))), cmpt(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))
  syl5eq(cmpt(s2, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))), cmpt(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  cbvmptv(s2, s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))), co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s0))))
  oveq12d(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(s2), cv(s0), c2)
  oveq2(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1), cexp)
  mpteq2dv(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  oveq2d(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s0)), co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  oveq1(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))
  mptex(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))))
  nn0ex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))))
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, cv(s0))
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cexp.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s2, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))))
  diff.cn0.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c2, cv(s0))
  diff.cmul.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, cv(s1), cexp, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cexp.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, cv(s2))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), cexp, cv(s2))
  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm pserval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℂ →(c1 ` c0)=(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s0)[×](c0[^]s0))))
  ⊣ c1 =(s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ ℂ →(c1 ` c0)=(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s0)[×](c0[^]s0)))), d(s0, c1))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cc, c1, (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s0)[×](c0[^]s0))), (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s0)[×](hs0[^]s0))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, cn0, ((c2 ` s0)[×](hs0[^]s0)), ((c2 ` s0)[×](c0[^]s0)), hs0 = c0)
  oveq2d((c2 ` s0), cmul, (hs0[^]s0), (c0[^]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, cexp, s0)
  eqtri(c1, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s0)[×](hs0[^]s0)))), (s1 ∈ ℂ ↦(s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2)))))
  cbvmptv(s1, hs0, cc, (s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2))), (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s0)[×](hs0[^]s0))))
  syl5eq((s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2))), (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s0)[×](hs0[^]s0))), (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s0)[×](s1[^]s0))), s1 = hs0)
  cbvmptv(s2, s0, cn0, ((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2)), ((c2 ` s0)[×](s1[^]s0)))
  oveq12d((c2 ` s2), cmul, (s1[^]s2), (c2 ` s0), (s1[^]s0), s2 = s0)
  fveq2(s2, s0, c2)
  oveq2(s2, s0, s1, cexp)
  mpteq2dv(s0, cn0, ((c2 ` s0)[×](s1[^]s0)), ((c2 ` s0)[×](hs0[^]s0)), s1 = hs0)
  oveq2d((c2 ` s0), cmul, (s1[^]s0), (hs0[^]s0), s1 = hs0)
  oveq1(s1, hs0, cexp, s0)
  mptex(s0, cn0, ((c2 ` s0)[×](c0[^]s0)))
  nn0ex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s0)[×](c0[^]s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, cn0, ((c2 ` s0)[×](hs0[^]s0)))
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, (c2 ` s0), cmul, (hs0[^]s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, hs0, cexp, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cexp.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c((s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2))))
  diff.cn0.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, (c2 ` s0), cmul, (s1[^]s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c2, s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, s1, cexp, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cexp.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, (c2 ` s2), cmul, (s1[^]s2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, s2)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, s1, cexp, s2)
  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: pserval2
blocks.content: Value of the function ` G ` that gives the sequence of monomials of a power series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)

thm pserval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), c1), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmul, co(c0, cexp, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cc, cmpt(s1, cn0, co(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), c1), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmul, co(c0, cexp, c1)))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  sylan9eq(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), c1), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmul, co(c0, cexp, c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)))), c1), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0))
  fveq1d(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cc))
  pserval(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c2, c3)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, cn0, cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cmul, co(c0, cexp, c1)), co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0))))
  oveq12d(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, c1), co(c0, cexp, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c3)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cexp)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  ovex(cfv(c3, c1), cmul, co(c0, cexp, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(c3, c1), cmul, co(c0, cexp, c1)))
}

blocks.name: psergf
blocks.content: The sequence of terms in the infinite sequence defining a power series for fixed ` X ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm psergf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(cfv(c0, c1), cn0, cc))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, cmpt(s1, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, cn0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wf(cfv(c0, c1), cn0, cc), wf(c2, cn0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  fmpt3d(hs0, cfv(c0, c1), cn0, cc, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0))), wa(wf(c2, cn0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adantl(wf(c2, cn0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cmpt(hs0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0))))))
  pserval(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c0, c2)
  mulcld(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wf(c2, cn0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)))
  adantlr(wf(c2, cn0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cc))
  ffvelrn(c2, cn0, cc, cv(hs0))
  adantll(wf(c2, cn0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0)), cc))
  expcl(c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wf(c2, cn0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm psergf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` c1): ℕ0 → ℂ))
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(s1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` s1)[×](s0[^]s1))))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : ℕ0 → ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0 ` c1): ℕ0 → ℂ), (c2 : ℕ0 → ℂ), c1 ∈ ℂ)
  fmpt3d(hs0, (c0 ` c1), cn0, cc, ((c2 ` hs0)[×](c1[^]hs0)), ((c2 : ℕ0 → ℂ)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  adantl((c2 : ℕ0 → ℂ), c1 ∈ ℂ, (c0 ` c1)=(hs0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` hs0)[×](c1[^]hs0))))
  pserval(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c0, c2)
  mulcld((c2 ` hs0), (c1[^]hs0), (((c2 : ℕ0 → ℂ)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantlr((c2 : ℕ0 → ℂ), c1 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, (c2 ` hs0)∈ ℂ)
  ffvelrn(c2, cn0, cc, hs0)
  adantll((c2 : ℕ0 → ℂ), c1 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, (c1[^]hs0)∈ ℂ)
  expcl(c1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(((c2 : ℕ0 → ℂ)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: radcnvlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ radcnvlt1 , ~ radcnvle . If ` X ` is a point closer to zero than ` Y ` and the power series converges at ` Y ` , then it converges absolutely at ` X ` , even if the terms in the sequence are multiplied by ` n ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm radcnvlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, c0), cdm(cli)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cc, cmpt(s1, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, cn0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c3), clt, cfv(cabs, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, cfv(c1, c4)), cdm(cli)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, cn0, co(cv(s2), cmul, cfv(cabs, cfv(cfv(c1, c3), cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, c0), cdm(cli))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, c0), cdm(cli))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  rexlimddv(hs1, cn0, w0, wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, c0), cdm(cli)), wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c4, cexp, cv(hs0)))), clt, nat1)))
  climi0(hs1, hs0, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c4, cexp, cv(hs0))), nat1, nat0, cfv(c1, c4), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat1, crp))
  1rp()
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wceq(cfv(cfv(c1, c4), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c4, cexp, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c4, cc))
  pserval2(s0, s1, c4, cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  serf0(hs0, cfv(c1, c4), cn0, nat0, universe, w0)
  0zd(w0)
  fvexd(c1, c4, w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cn0, cfv(c1, c4), cc, w0)
  psergf(s0, s1, c1, c4, c2, w0)
  cvgcmpce(s2, nat0, c0, cn0, cv(hs1), cmpt(hs2, cn0, co(cv(hs2), cmul, co(co(cfv(cabs, c3), cdiv, cfv(cabs, c4)), cexp, cv(hs2)))), nat1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(c4, cexp, cv(hs0)))), clt, nat1)))))
  nn0uz()

  ⊢ (w0 → seq(0(+,(abs ∘(c0 ` c1))))∈ dom(~~>))

thm radcnvlt1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(0(+, c0))∈ dom(~~>)∧ seq(0(+,(abs ∘(c1 ` c2))))∈ dom(~~>)))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(s1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c3 ` s1)[×](s0[^]s1))))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : ℕ0 → ℂ))
  ⊣ c4 = sup({ s2 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>)}, ℝ*, <)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(abs ` c2)[<]c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s3[×](abs `((c1 ` c2)` s3))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c3)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(seq(0(+, c0))∈ dom(~~>)∧ seq(0(+,(abs ∘(c1 ` c2))))∈ dom(~~>))), d(s2, s3))
  mpd(w0, (seq(0(+, c0))∈ dom(~~>)∧ seq(0(+,(abs ∘(c1 ` c2))))∈ dom(~~>)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ,(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧ ¬ hs0[≤](abs ` c2))))
  sylibr(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ,(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧ ¬ hs0[≤](abs ` c2))), ¬ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ,(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)→ hs0[≤](abs ` c2))))
  mtbid(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ,(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)→ hs0[≤](abs ` c2))), c4[≤](abs ` c2))
  mpbid(w0, ¬ c4[≤](abs ` c2), (abs ` c2)[<]c4)
  syl2anc(w0, ((abs ` c2)[<]c4 ↔ ¬ c4[≤](abs ` c2)), (abs ` c2)∈ ℝ*, c4 ∈ ℝ*)
  sseldi(c4, cxr, (0[[,]]+∞), w0)
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  radcnvcl(s0, s1, s2, c4, c1, c3, w0)
  xrltnle((abs ` c2), c4)
  syl6bb(w0, c4[≤](abs ` c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ,(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)→ hs0[≤](abs ` c2))), ∀(hs0 ∈ { s2 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>)}, hs0[≤](abs ` c2)))
  syl5bb(w0, c4[≤](abs ` c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ { s2 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>)}, hs0[≤](abs ` c2)), sup({ s2 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>)}, ℝ*, <)[≤](abs ` c2))
  breq1i(c4, cle, (abs ` c2), sup({ s2 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>)}, ℝ*, <))
  sylancr(w0, (sup({ s2 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>)}, ℝ*, <)[≤](abs ` c2)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ { s2 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>)}, hs0[≤](abs ` c2))), { s2 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>)} ⊆ ℝ*, (abs ` c2)∈ ℝ*)
  sstri({ s2 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>)}, cxr, cr)
  ssrab2(s2, cr, seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>))
  sseldi((abs ` c2), cxr, cr, w0)
  ressxr()
  supxrleub(hs0, { s2 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>)}, (abs ` c2))
  ralrab(hs0, s2, cr, seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2)))∈ dom(~~>), hs0[≤](abs ` c2), seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>))
  eleq1d(seq(0(+,(c1 ` s2))), dom(~~>), seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0))), s2 = hs0)
  seqeq3d(nat0, caddc, (c1 ` s2), (c1 ` hs0), s2 = hs0)
  fveq2(s2, hs0, c1)

  expimpd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>), ¬ hs0[≤](abs ` c2), (seq(0(+, c0))∈ dom(~~>)∧ seq(0(+,(abs ∘(c1 ` c2))))∈ dom(~~>)))
  sylbird(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧ seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)), ¬ hs0[≤](abs ` c2), (seq(0(+, c0))∈ dom(~~>)∧ seq(0(+,(abs ∘(c1 ` c2))))∈ dom(~~>)), (abs ` c2)[<]hs0)
  adantr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>), ((abs ` c2)[<]hs0 ↔ ¬ hs0[≤](abs ` c2)))
  sylan(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, ((abs ` c2)[<]hs0 ↔ ¬ hs0[≤](abs ` c2)), (abs ` c2)∈ ℝ)
  abscld(c2, w0)
  ltnle((abs ` c2), hs0)
  expr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>), (abs ` c2)[<]hs0, (seq(0(+, c0))∈ dom(~~>)∧ seq(0(+,(abs ∘(c1 ` c2))))∈ dom(~~>)))
  jca(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)), seq(0(+, c0))∈ dom(~~>), seq(0(+,(abs ∘(c1 ` c2))))∈ dom(~~>))
  radcnvlem1(s0, s1, s3, c0, c1, c3, c2, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)))
  radcnvlem2(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0), (c3 : ℕ0 → ℂ))
  recnd(hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)))
  breqtrrd((abs ` c2), clt, (abs ` hs0), hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)))
  absidd(hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)))
  ltled(nat0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)))
  lelttrd(nat0, hs0, (abs ` c2), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)))
  0red(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)))
  abscld(c2, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)))
  simplr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0))
  absge0d(c2, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0)))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>)∧(abs ` c2)[<]hs0), c2 ∈ ℂ)
  simprr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>), (abs ` c2)[<]hs0)
  simprl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), seq(0(+,(c1 ` hs0)))∈ dom(~~>), (abs ` c2)[<]hs0)

blocks.name: radcnvlt2
blocks.content: If ` X ` is within the open disk of radius ` R ` centered at zero, then the infinite series converges at ` X ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)

thm radcnvlt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, cfv(c0, c1)), cdm(cli)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cc, cmpt(s1, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, cn0, cc))
  -| wceq(c3, csup(crab(s2, cr, wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), cdm(cli))), cxr, clt))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), clt, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  abscvgcvg(hs0, nat0, cfv(c0, c1), cn0, ccom(cabs, cfv(c0, c1)), w0)
  nn0uz()
  0zd(w0)
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wceq(cfv(ccom(cabs, cfv(c0, c1)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(cfv(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), wf(cfv(c0, c1), cn0, cc))
  fvco3(cfv(c0, c1), cn0, cc, cv(hs0), cabs)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cn0, cfv(c0, c1), cc, w0)
  psergf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)

blocks.name: radcnvle
blocks.content: If ` X ` is a convergent point of the infinite series, then ` X ` is within the closed disk of radius ` R ` centered at zero. Or, by contraposition, the series diverges at any point strictly more than ` R ` from the origin. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: dvradcnv
blocks.content: The radius of convergence of the (formal) derivative ` H ` of the power series ` G ` is at least as large as the radius of convergence of ` G ` . (In fact they are equal, but we don't have as much use for the negative side of this claim.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: pserulm
blocks.content: If ` S ` is a region contained in a circle of radius ` M < R ` , then the sequence of partial sums of the infinite series converges uniformly on ` S ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: psercn2
blocks.content: Since by ~ pserulm the series converges uniformly, it is also continuous by ~ ulmcn . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Mar-2015.)

thm psercn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(s1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c3 ` s1)[×](s0[^]s1))))
  ⊣ c0 =(s2 ∈ c1 ↦ sum(s3 ∈ ℕ0,((c2 ` s2)` s3)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : ℕ0 → ℂ))
  ⊣ c4 = sup({ s4 ∈ ℝ | seq(0(+,(c2 ` s4)))∈ dom(~~>)}, ℝ*, <)
  ⊣ c5 =(s5 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s2 ∈ c1 ↦(seq(0(+,(c2 ` s2)))` s5)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6[<]c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆(`' abs "(0[[,]]c6)))

  expcl(s2, hs0)

  fsumcn(s2, hs0, cc, (0[...]s5), ((c3 ` hs0)[×](s2[^]hs0)), (TopOpen ` CCfld), (TopOpen ` CCfld), (w0 ∧ s5 ∈ ℕ0))
  a1i((w0 ∧ s5 ∈ ℕ0), (TopOpen ` CCfld)∈(TopOn ` ℂ))
  fzfid(nat0, s5, (w0 ∧ s5 ∈ ℕ0))
  cnmpt12f(s2, cc, (c3 ` hs0), cmul, (s2[^]hs0), (TopOpen ` CCfld), (TopOpen ` CCfld), (TopOpen ` CCfld), (TopOpen ` CCfld), ((w0 ∧ s5 ∈ ℕ0)∧ hs0 ∈(0[...]s5)))
  cnmptc(s2, cc, (c3 ` hs0), (TopOpen ` CCfld), (TopOpen ` CCfld), cc, ((w0 ∧ s5 ∈ ℕ0)∧ hs0 ∈(0[...]s5)))

blocks.name: psercn
blocks.content: An infinite series converges to a continuous function on the open disk of radius ` R ` , where ` R ` is the radius of convergence of the series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: pserdv
blocks.content: The derivative of a power series on its region of convergence. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pserdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cc, cdv, c0), cmpt(s0, c1, csu(s1, cn0, co(co(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), cmul, cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s2, cc, cmpt(s3, cn0, co(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, cv(s3))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, csu(s4, cn0, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(s4)))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, cn0, cc))
  -| wceq(c4, csup(crab(s5, cr, wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, cfv(c3, cv(s5))), cdm(cli))), cxr, clt))
  -| wceq(c1, cima(ccnv(cabs), co(nat0, cico, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cif(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(s6)), caddc, c4), cdiv, nat2), co(cfv(cabs, cv(s6)), caddc, nat1), wcel(c4, cr)))
  -| wceq(c6, co(nat0, cfv(cbl, ccom(cabs, cmin)), co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(s6)), caddc, c5), cdiv, nat2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s6)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c3)
  -| diffsc(s4, c5)
  -| diffsc(s4, c6)
  -| diffsc(s5, c2)

} = {
  syl6eq(co(cc, cdv, c0), cmpt(s0, c1, csu(s1, cn0, co(co(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), cmul, cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))), cmpt(s6, c1, csu(s1, cn0, co(co(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), cmul, cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cmul, co(cv(s6), cexp, cv(s1))))), w0)
  eqtrd(co(cc, cdv, c0), cmpt(s6, c1, csu(s1, cn0, co(co(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), cmul, cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))), cmul, co(cv(s6), cexp, cv(s1))))), cmpt(s6, c1, cfv(co(cc, cdv, c0), cv(s6))), w0)
  feqmptd(s6, co(cc, cdv, c0), c1, cc, w0)
  mpbii(w0, wf(co(cc, cdv, c0), c1, cc), wf(co(cc, cdv, c0), cdm(co(cc, cdv, c0)), cc))

blocks.name: abelthlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ abelth . The peculiar region ` S ` , known as a _Stolz angle_ , is a teardrop-shaped subset of the closed unit ball containing ` 1 ` . Indeed, except for ` 1 ` itself, the rest of the Stolz angle is enclosed in the open unit ball. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Mar-2015.)

thm abelthlem4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : ℕ0 → ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(0(+, c2))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → 0[≤]c3)
  ⊣ c1 = { s0 ∈ ℂ |(abs `(1[-]s0))[≤](c3[×](1[-](abs ` s0)))}
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ c1 ↦ sum(s2 ∈ ℕ0,((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℂ)), d(s0, s2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℂ)), d(s1, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℂ)), d(s1, c3))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℂ)), d(s2, c3))
  fmptd(s1, c0, c1, cc, sum(s2 ∈ ℕ0,((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2))), w0)
  isumcl(s2, cn0, ((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2)), nat0, (hs0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` hs0)[×](s1[^]hs0))), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  nn0uz()
  0zd((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  adantl((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), s2 ∈ ℕ0, ((hs0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` hs0)[×](s1[^]hs0)))` s2)=((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2)))
  fvmpt(hs0, s2, cn0, (hs0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` hs0)[×](s1[^]hs0))), ((c2 ` s2)[×](s1[^]s2)), ((c2 ` hs0)[×](s1[^]hs0)))
  oveq12d((c2 ` hs0), cmul, (s1[^]hs0), (c2 ` s2), (s1[^]s2), hs0 = s2)
  fveq2(hs0, s2, c2)
  oveq2(hs0, s2, s1, cexp)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2 ` hs0)[×](s1[^]hs0))))
  ovex((c2 ` s2), cmul, (s1[^]s2))
  mulcld((c2 ` s2), (s1[^]s2), ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ s2 ∈ ℕ0))
  ffvelrnda(s2, cn0, c2, cc, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c1, (c2 : ℕ0 → ℂ))
  sylan((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), s2 ∈ ℕ0, (s1[^]s2)∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ)
  sselda(s1, c1, cc, w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 ⊆ ℂ)
  ssrab3(s0, c1, cc, (abs `(1[-]s0))[≤](c3[×](1[-](abs ` s0))))
  expcl(s1, s2)
  abelthlem3(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.cmpt.s(s2, hs0, cn0, ((c2 ` hs0)[×](s1[^]hs0)))
  diff.cn0.s(s2)

  diff.cfv.s(s2, c2, hs0)

blocks.name: abelthlem9
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ abelth . By adjusting the constant term, we can assume that the entire series converges to ` 0 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: abelth
blocks.content: Abel's theorem. If the power series ` sum_ n e. NN0 A ( n ) ( x ^ n ) ` is convergent at ` 1 ` , then it is equal to the limit from "below", along a Stolz angle ` S ` (note that the ` M = 1 ` case of a Stolz angle is the real line ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` ). (Continuity on ` S \ { 1 } ` follows more generally from ~ psercn .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: abelth2
blocks.content: Abel's theorem, restricted to the ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` interval. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm abelth2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, co(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), ccncf, cc), cres(cmpt(s0, crab(hs0, cc, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cle, co(nat1, cmul, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)))))), csu(s1, cn0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), w0)

  3brtr4d(cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cle, co(nat1, cmul, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)))), co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)), co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))

  resubcl(nat1, cv(hs0))
  abelth(hs0, s0, s1, cmpt(s0, crab(hs0, cc, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cle, co(nat1, cmul, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)))))), csu(s1, cn0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))), crab(hs0, cc, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cle, co(nat1, cmul, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)))))), c1, nat1, w0)

  eqid(crab(hs0, cc, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cle, co(nat1, cmul, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)))))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, crab(hs0, cc, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cle, co(nat1, cmul, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)))))), csu(s1, cn0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))))
  rescncf(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), crab(hs0, cc, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cle, co(nat1, cmul, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)))))), cmpt(s0, crab(hs0, cc, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cle, co(nat1, cmul, co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)))))), csu(s1, cn0, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))), cc)
